memberdef.argsstring: (HgiBufferHandle const &buffer, HdTupleType tupleType, int offset, int stride, int numElements, int elementStride, HdStResourceRegistry *resourceRegistry)
memberdef.name: HdStReadBuffer

briefdescription.para: Reads the content of buffer back to VtArray.

detaileddescription.para: The offset is expressed in bytes.
